item.title: How Steve Jobs Used the Rule of 3 to Command Attention, Spark Innovation, and Make Even the Most Boring Decisions
item.description: First, you learn the rules. Then, you learn how to break them.

item.title: The Money People Still Won’t Admit We’re In an AI Bubble—And They Never Will
item.description: Why venture capitalists and private equity investors refuse to say the quiet part out loud.

item.title: Zuckerberg’s Former Top AI Researcher Goes Scorched Earth on Meta in a New Interview
item.description: Yann LeCun didn’t hold back on his employer’s AI shortcomings.

item.title: Did John Deere Build the Future, or a Cage?
item.description: One farmer’s harrowing story exposes the tech takeover of America’s heartland, and the fight to reclaim the keys.

item.title: Forget New Year’s Resolutions: Psychology Reveals How to Rewire Your Brain for Success in 2026
item.description: Research shows most January goals don’t stick—but being more intention-based about getting a new job or hitting the gym can help.
